description: Redevelopment of site to include erection of a fifth storey to original building, extensions to basement, and a 5 storey rear extension to form 66 bedroom hotel comprising of swimming pool at basement level, 20 space car park, restaurant and reception at ground floor level, fitness club at first floor level and bedrooms on levels 2, 3 & 4
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is occupied.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800  to 1800 on Mondays to Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and public holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Before commencement of operations, a scheme shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority to cover the following matters:

(i)	any external illumination of the site

(ii)	measures to ensure that all mud and other loose materials are not carried on the wheels and chassis of any vehicles leaving the site; and

(iii)	measures to minimise dust nuisance caused by the operations and to ensure that no dust or other debris is carried on to the adjoining properties.

The scheme so approved should be fully implemented.

Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for storing of waste and recycled materials have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 7 - The use hereby permitted for hotel purposes shall not be begun until full particulars and details of a scheme to insulate the bedrooms against the transmission of airborne and impact sound has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given.

Condition : 8 - The use hereby permitted forhealth and fitness centre shall not be begun until full particulars and details of a scheme to insulate the health and fitness premises against the transmission of airborne and impact sound has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given.

Condition : 9 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for control of fumes and odours including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant, including ventilation of the car park, has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing.

Condition : 10 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for the ventilation of the premises of an appropriate outlet level, including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant, including within the car park, and the standard or dilution expected has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 11 - Before commencement of development, details of parking and servicing (including parking spaces for people with disabilities, layout of servicing areas, arrangements for waiting system to enter underground car park and elevations of ramp to car park and retaining wall) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The parking spaces shown on the approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and shall be permanently available for parking and not used for any other purpose. The waiting system and ramp shall be installed as approved.

Condition : 12 - Before development commences details of sightlines at the point of access to the public highway shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the development shall be carried out in accordance with the details.

Condition : 13 - Before commencement of development, details of parking and servicing (including parking spaces for people with disabilities, layout of servicing areas, arrangements for waiting system to enter underground car park and elevations of ramp to car park and retaining wall) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The parking spaces shown on the approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and shall be permanently available for parking and not used for any other purpose. The waiting system and ramp shall be installed as approved.

Condition : 14 - The parking, loading and turning spaces shown on drawing No. 716/201C received 14.5.03 shall be constructed and available for use before first occupation of any part of the development and such spaces shall not be used for any other purposes.

Condition : 15 - Before the development hereby permitted is commenced a scheme indicating the provision to be made for disabled people to gain access to the hotel, health and fitness centre and associated bar / restaurant shall have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The agreed scheme shall be implemented before the development hereby permitted is brought into use.
Condition : 16 - The heights of the approved buildings shall in all cases be in accordance with the approved elevations shown on drawings no 716/208C received 14.5.03
Condition : 17 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 18 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the north and west walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 19 - The occupier shall submit a Green Travel Plan and car park 	management plan to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing prior to first occupation of any part of the development. The Green Travel Plan and car park management plan as approved to be 	implemented and thereafter retained 

The occupier shall submit a Green Travel Plan and car park 	management plan to the Local Planning Authority and approved in 	writing prior to first occupation of any part of the development. The 	Green Travel Plan and car park management plan as approved to be 	implemented and thereafter retained
